verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daveedu vamsa yesu kristuku Stuthi chellinchudi Swargastulamagutaku manalanu Vidipinchina prabhuvunaku Hosanna hosanna bhuvilo santhosham{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Priya thandri ee bhuvilo sakala mahimayu neeke Surya chandra srusti yaavaththu Stutiyinchi mahimaparachun Hosanna hosanna kroththa yeroosalemulo{/lang-eng}
